{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=TAP-R2 |asin=B00R4N1KKU |fcc_date=04/13/2015 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Loopcomm |manuf_model=LP-9096TR |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ZTT-TAPR2 |ic_id=10233A-TAPR2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197DN |ram1_brand=EtronTech |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=touchscreen, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Amped_TAPR2_2.4, Amped_TAPR2_5.0 |default_ip=192.168.3.1 }} {{TagLine|High Power Touch Screen AC750 Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/tap-r2.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Amped|model=tap-r2}}
"LPCY0052 V1.1" is silkscreened on the PCB in the FCC photos.
